html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-00212022-01-04,  ,  ESDC,  , 
ActCanada Worker Lockdown Benefit Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Lockdown Regions Designation Order (COVID-19), No. 2
PrecisOrder No. 2 amending the LOCKDOWN REGIONS DESIGNATION ORDER (COVID-19) to designate Yukon and the Northwest Territories as “lockdown regions” in accordance with the Regulations amending the CANADA WORKER LOCKDOWN BENEFIT ACT (LOCKDOWN ORDER DEFINITION AND MINIMUM LOCKDOWN PERIOD), retroactive to the week beginning December 19, 2021 until such time as these lockdown orders cease to have effect.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0001 Publication Date: 2022-01-19
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending the Lockdown Regions Designation Order (COVID-19), No. 2
precis: Order No. 2 amending the LOCKDOWN REGIONS DESIGNATION ORDER (COVID-19) to designate Yukon and the Northwest Territories as “lockdown regions” in accordance with the Regulations amending the CANADA WORKER LOCKDOWN BENEFIT ACT (LOCKDOWN ORDER DEFINITION AND MINIMUM LOCKDOWN PERIOD), retroactive to the week beginning December 19, 2021 until such time as these lockdown orders cease to have effect.
